alert.note: Alert for Baker; Duval; Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 23 at 4:56PM EDT until March 23 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 68 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA BAKER DUVAL NASSAU IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA BRANTLEY CAMDEN CHARLTON GLYNN PIERCE WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ARLINGTON, ATKINSON, BLACKSHEAR, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOCTORTOWN, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, FERNANDINA BEACH, FOLKSTON, GARDI, GLYNN HAVEN, HICKOX, HILLIARD, HOBOKEN, HOMELAND, HORTENSE, JACKSONVILLE, JEKYLL ISLAND, JESUP, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, MACCLENNY, NAHUNTA, NORMANDY, OCEANWAY, OLUSTEE, ORTEGA, RACE POND, RATLIFF, RAYBON, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, SEA ISLAND, ST. GEORGE, ST. SIMONS, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, THALMANN, WAYNESVILLE, WINOKUR, AND YULEE.
